description: A band of misfit rich kids in Mexico strike out on their own selling MDMA and quickly run into trouble with other narcos, the law and their families.

title: The Yard
description: After a fateful domestic clash, a devoted mother finds herself in prison and fighting to survive in hopes of reuniting with her daughter.

description: After surrendering to Bogotá police, an ex-guerrilla avoids prison by working undercover to investigate a ruthless enforcer of government corruption.

description: Hit hard by the Lehman shock, a well-meaning young man joins a phone scam operation and gets increasingly embroiled in the underworld.

description: In a future where regeneration technology lets humans live indefinitely, a cop and a troubled young woman investigate a strange wave of youth suicides.

title: Nowhere Man

description: During a holiday stay at a hotel resort, a flight attendant encounters a wealthy, mysterious man with two different personas.

description: A detective finds himself 30 years in the future and must solve a string of grisly crimes before he can return to the past.

title: Brotherhood
description: An honest lawyer reaches a moral crossroads after the cops force her to inform on her incarcerated brother, the leader of a rising criminal faction.

title: Drug Squad: Costa del Sol

description: When a mysterious box arrives at his door, a doctor and father is forced to participate in a twisted killing game, or risk losing everything.

title: Black Money Love
description: After a cop's fiancée and a jewelry designer's father are found dead together, the two bereaved ones face a perilous aftermath of a theft gone wrong.

title: The Lies Within
description: After her father dies and her husband goes missing, Kim Seo-hui teams up with detective Jo Tae-sik and joins the National Assembly.

title: Peaky Blinders

title: Gotham

title: El Marginal

description: A former Marine poses as an inmate inside a Mexican prison in order to infiltrate a gang suspected of kidnapping a U.S. judge's teen daughter.

title: Criminal: Germany
description: In the interview room, detectives go head-to-head with suspects and try to get to the truth – even if it means breaking the rules and risking it all.

title: Criminal: Spain
description: Psychological games abound between detectives and suspects in a tense interrogation room, where the search for answers sometimes comes at a moral cost.

description: In this documentary series on the tangled history of allegations against musician R. Kelly, women give detailed accounts of sexual and mental abuse.

title: Top Boy

description: After a young woman is accused of lying about a rape, two female detectives investigate a spate of eerily similar attacks. Inspired by true events.

description: Through intense prison interviews, Piers Morgan revisits the crimes of three convicted serial killers and learns more about their motives.

description: A family on the brink of splitting up become the owners of a cutting-edge robot being sought by a corporation, homicide investigators and terrorists.

description: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

title: Bad Guys

description: Three young friends in Goa plan to search an old villa for ghosts, but when a new family moves in, the home’s buried past resurfaces in chilling ways.

description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.

description: Based on real events, the fictional story of Mexican drug lord El Chato's number one hitman, El Cholo.

description: Haunted by a traumatic past, Jessica Jones uses her gifts as a private eye to find her tormentor before he can harm anyone else in Hell's Kitchen.

title: The Defected
description: After surviving a near-fatal injury on the job, a cop sets out to investigate a conspiracy involving the top brass of the police department.

description: A scandal erupts in Brazil during an investigation of alleged government corruption via oil and construction companies. Loosely inspired by true events.

title: Abyss
description: After meeting an untimely demise in separate incidents, Cha Min and Go Se-yeon discover they’ve come back to life in new bodies they don’t recognize.

description: In a peaceful, rustic town, a retired officer and his family are mired in a murder mystery riddled with shocking, buried secrets.

description: A former Marine out to punish the criminals responsible for his family's murder finds himself ensnared in a military conspiracy.

description: When the head of the lucrative family business passes away, his will leaves the clan at extreme odds.

description: An honest – though overzealous – police officer strives to do good work while dealing with his bickering parents and incompetent coworkers.

title: Fugitiva

description: While Cleaver Greene is a brilliant and driven attorney, he's also an ex-druggie, a current gambling addict and loathed by many of his colleagues.

description: Saved from a plane crash and given supernatural powers, teen Tarzan joins forces with brave city girl Jane to protect his jungle home from threats.

description: After a young boy is murdered in the small seaside town of Broadchurch, local detectives Ellie Miller and Alec Hardy are assigned the mysterious case.

description: An ambitious young law enforcement graduate is thrilled when her idol takes her on as a trainee. But his methods aren't anything like she imagined.

description: In 19th-century Canada, a psychiatrist weighs whether a murderess should be pardoned due to insanity. Based on Margaret Atwood's award-winning novel.

description: A devious businessman covets his partner's priceless treasure map, while a related murder case calls into question some biological family ties.

description: When a woman is brutally murdered on a playground, a group of detectives find themselves drawn into a dark conspiracy as they search for the killer.

description: After testifying against the Mafia, ex-gangster Frank Tagliano enters witness protection and asks to be sent to Norway.

description: A high school chemistry teacher dying of cancer teams with a former student to secure his family's future by manufacturing and selling crystal meth.

title: Anjaan: Rural Myths

description: A homicide detective and a veteran who has been turned into a beast by a military experiment gone awry become allies after they meet by chance.

title: Behzat Ç.
description: An Ankara homicide detective with a dark personal life and a disdain for rules and political correctness solves murders and fights police corruption.

title: Bitter Daisies
description: While investigating the disappearance of a teen girl in a tight-knit Galician town, a Civil Guard officer uncovers secrets linked to a loss of her own.

title: Black Heart
description: Blaming a crooked media mogul for the death of his journalist sister, a surgeon enlists the help of a beautiful psychologist to get revenge.

title: Brave Miss World
description: Weeks before being named Miss World, Linor Abargil was raped. She tells the world her inspiring true story in this Emmy-nominated documentary.

title: Camelia la Texana
description: Inspired by the famous song "Contrabando y Traición," Camelia, a beautiful girl from San Antonio, kills her lover and becomes a legendary drug runner.

title: Cannabis
description: When a huge marijuana shipment falls prey to thieves, the aftermath touches players from all ranks of the drug trade between Morocco and Europe.

title: Click for Murder
description: Crime journalist Donal MacIntyre reveals how deadly the internet can be as he dissects the technological methods behind heinous acts.

title: Cold Case Files
description: Masterful detectives utilize forensic science and criminal psychology to re-examine long-standing cases.

title: Cold Case Files Classic
description: Through forensic science and criminal psychology, an elite breed of detectives reexamine long-unsolved crimes to deliver justice and the truth.

title: Court Justice
description: In a bustling local court in Sydney, 12 magistrates preside over different levels of criminal offenses and deliver life-changing verdicts.

title: Crime Time
description: Born into poverty and trapped in a grim job as a cop in the favelas, a wannabe actor forges a bloody path to celebrity and wealth. Based on true events.

title: Dandy
description: A law professor is enlisted by Mexico's attorney general to join a special operations unit infiltrating the capital's most notorious drug cartel.

title: Darr Sabko Lagta Hai
description: In this chilling horror anthology series, actress and model Bipasha Basu meets people who have had disconcerting paranormal experiences.

title: Day and Night
description: A detective assists with an investigation into a brutal mass murder case in which his twin brother is the prime suspect.

title: Deep Undercover Collection
description: Former FBI agent Joe Pistone, the real-life "Donnie Brasco," hosts this series that reveals the true stories of undercover crime-fighting operations.

title: Deep Water
description: Back in Bondi Beach, where she grew up, DC Tori Lustigman investigates a gay man's murder and finds a link to her brother's death decades earlier.

title: Dexter
description: By day, mild-mannered Dexter is a blood-spatter analyst for the Miami police. But at night, he is a serial killer who only targets other murderers.

title: Drugs, Inc.
description: This absorbing documentary series follows the entire supply chain of the illicit drug trade, tracing its production, export, sale and consumption.

title: Dueños del paraíso
description: When Anastasia Cardona's drug lord husband is murdered, she inherits his cocaine empire, leading to a life of wealth, power, violence and betrayal.

title: El Cartel
description: One man makes a fateful decision to get involved with a Colombian drug cartel in this series based on a novel by Andrés López López.

title: El Cartel 2
description: Drug trafficker Pepe Cadena navigates the treacherous waters of warring cartels in Mexico and Colombia while avoiding capture by the DEA and police.

title: Encounters with Evil
description: This documentary series tries to get at the root of some of the most heinous crimes ever committed by deranged, cold-blooded criminals.

title: Enemigo íntimo
description: Siblings separated as children who no longer recognize each other are pitted against each other in a war involving drugs, crime and betrayal.

title: Ezel
description: A young man framed for a crime escapes a prison sentence by faking his own death and assuming a new identity as he seeks revenge.

title: Fake or Fortune?
description: Fiona Bruce and Philip Mould use investigative skills and scientific techniques to determine if paintings are real or just impressive forgeries.

title: Fatal Destiny
description: A young man from a humble family is drawn into a life of crime – and soon confronts a determined cop in hot pursuit.

title: Fear Files... Har Mod Pe Darr
description: Possessed lovers, witches, haunted houses and more bring tales of horror to the screen in this anthology series.

title: Filinta
description: In 19th-century Istanbul, a young police officer investigates crimes and falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy merchant conspiring against him.

title: Four Seasons in Havana
description: As Havana slowly revolves through the year, wistful detective Mario Conde probes the sultry heart of the city to investigate dark and deadly crimes.

title: Gentlemen and Gangsters
description: Now on the run, a writer relates his previous year's escapades when he got sucked into the thrilling, sordid orbit of boxer and jazz man Henry Morgan.

title: Get Shorty
description: Organized crime enforcer Miles Daly strives to reinvent himself as a Hollywood filmmaker in this satire based on Elmore Leonard's best-selling novel.

title: Gomorrah
description: Mafia activity in Naples is at the center of this series, which focuses on internal struggles that follow after the head of a family is imprisoned.

title: Hannibal
description: This drama series focuses on the early years of the relationship between FBI criminal profiler Will Graham and homicidal cannibal Dr. Hannibal Lecter.

title: Happy Valley
description: Yorkshire police sergeant Catherine Cawood pursues the man who assaulted her late daughter, unaware he is now part of a secret kidnapping plot.

title: Harold Shipman - Driven to Kill
description: Interviews and dramatic reconstructions illuminate the twisted motivations and brazen crimes of serial killer and respected physician, Harold Shipman.

title: Haven
description: Residents of Haven, Maine, are plagued by supernatural afflictions. To reveal the truth, FBI agent Audrey Parker must delve into her own strange past.

title: Helix
description: While investigating a possible outbreak at an Arctic research facility, scientists discover a new virus that could wipe out every human on the planet.

title: Hell on Wheels
description: Former Confederate soldier Cullen Bohannon sets out on a quest to find his wife's killer as post-Civil War America struggles to rebuild its identity.

title: Hinterland
description: Forsaking London for the rustic landscapes of Wales, a police detective with a troubled soul finds himself in a place with secrets as dark as his own.

title: Historia de un clan
description: This drama based on a true story follows the Puccios, a criminal family who kidnaps wealthy people and holds them hostage in their home.

title: Hotel Beau Séjour
description: Caught in an afterlife limbo, teenage Kato investigates her own mysterious death and unravels a web of secrets in her seemingly tranquil village.

title: Inside the Mind of a Serial Killer
description: Mixing dramatic re-enactments with real-life footage, this series delves into the tormented psyches of the world's most infamous serial killers.

title: Intelligence
description: Clashes both on the street and in the bedroom pits the female head of the Organized Crime Unit against the cocky leader of a pot-smuggling ring.

title: Jack Taylor
description: Ken Bruen's bestselling crime novels leap to life in this series of TV movies featuring Irish cop-turned-private-investigator Jack Taylor.

title: Kaçak
description: A cop who killed a mobster's son and fled to a small town with a changed identity finds his quiet new life disrupted when he becomes a local hero.

title: Khaani
description: After a rich politician's son kills a young woman's brother, an unlikely romantic connection complicates her pursuit of justice.

title: Khan: No. 1 Crime Hunter
description: From fake marriages to online shopping fraud, a whip-smart police officer investigates truly baffling cons that were inspired by true stories.

title: Khotey Sikkey
description: Five affluent youths find a new sense of purpose as they team up with a Mumbai police officer on crime-busting missions around the city.

title: La Piloto
description: Dreaming her whole life of becoming a pilot, Yolanda finds work as a flight attendant, unaware she'll soon be thrust into a drug smuggling operation.

title: La Rosa de Guadalupe
description: This series responds to the need to believe in miracles, dreams, love stories and happy endings, with positive characters.

title: La Viuda Negra
description: Beautiful and ruthless Griselda Blanco, known as the queen of cocaine, becomes Pablo Escobar's boss and governs a world of deceit and death.

title: Last
description: When his big stock plan fails, a hotshot fund manager winds up homeless and must learn the secret ranking system of the street in order to survive.

title: Lo que la verdad esconde: El caso Asunta (Operacion Nenúfar)
description: This true crime series investigates newfound evidence and unanswered questions in famous criminal cases, such as the murder of Asunta Basterra Porto.

title: Lo que la vida me robó
description: In seaside Aguazul, beautiful Montserrat and her wily mother tangle with lovers, gangsters, financial ruin, obsession – and murder.

title: London Spy
description: When his reclusive-banker lover disappears, a hard-partying young British hedonist plunges into the dangerous world of espionage to find the truth.

title: Los tiempos de Pablo Escobar
description: Featuring never-before-seen images, personal testimonies and more, this is the story of one of the most notorious drug smugglers of all time.

title: Miss Dynamite
description: Wealthy, beautiful Valentina falls in love, only to realize that her man and her family are involved with one of Mexico's most powerful drug cartels.

title: Murderous Affairs
description: Mixing interviews with dramatic re-enactments, this series focuses on lethal love affairs and spouses driven to murder.

title: NSU German History X
description: After German reunification, the neo-Nazi National Socialist Underground begins a killing spree while cops fight an uphill battle to catch them.

title: Nurses Who Kill
description: Top medical, criminal and psychological experts analyze the motives and methods of nurses who use their positions to kill rather than heal.

title: OCTB
description: An undercover detective crosses paths with familiar faces in the mafia underworld during the final years of Britain's ruling of Hong Kong.

title: Pacific Heat
description: In this animated satire, a covert squad of operatives short on smarts but long on confidence tackles crime on the glitzy Gold Coast of Australia.

title: Person of Interest
description: Ex-CIA agent John Reese and enigmatic billionaire Mr. Finch use software that can predict future events to prevent violent crimes before they occur.

title: Powder
description: Two men who grew up in Mumbai's slums are drawn into the city's brutal narcotics trade, where they fight on opposite sides of the law.

title: Prohibition: A Film by Ken Burns and Lynn Novick
description: Ken Burns's documentary traces the passage of the 18th Amendment, the social and legal effects of prohibiting alcohol, and the repeal of Prohibition.

title: Rectify
description: Convicted of rape and murder at age 18, Daniel Holden spends nearly 20 years on death row until DNA evidence brings the verdict into question.

title: Republic of Doyle
description: A pair of father and son private investigators tries to keep their combustible personal lives in check while tackling an intriguing array of cases.

title: Revenge
description: After a mother and her daughter are gang-raped by seven men, the daughter suffers a mental breakdown, and the single mom sets out to get revenge.

title: Scandal
description: A powerful team of Washington, D.C. lawyers makes scandals disappear while handling government crises and coping with problems of their own.

title: Shadow of Truth
description: This documentary series explores the explosive 2006 murder case of a 13-year-old Israeli girl and the subsequent conviction of a Ukrainian immigrant.

title: Sherlock
description: In this updated take on Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's beloved mystery tales, the eccentric sleuth prowls the streets of modern London in search of clues.

title: Silver Spoon
description: Forced to become an apprentice cop, cocky playboy Igor finds he's got a knack for police work. But his job soon takes him down a dark personal path.

title: Strong Girl Bong-soon
description: Born with supernatural strength, Bong-soon fights evil and procures justice while getting tangled in a love triangle with her CEO boss and cop crush.

title: Surviving R. Kelly Part II: The Reckoning
description: As more women come forward with harrowing accusations against R. Kelly, his criminal case gains momentum in this follow-up to the powerful docuseries.

title: Taken
description: After a personal tragedy upends his life, a highly skilled former Green Beret is drawn into a career as a secret government operative.

title: The Great Train Robbery
description: This two-part tale delivers the true story of the Great Train Robbery of 1963, the biggest one in England's history.

title: The Investigator: A British Crime Story
description: After 40 years of inconclusive evidence, renowned criminologist Mark Williams-Thomas re-examines a string of mysterious murders.

title: The Irish Mob
description: This documentary crime series charts the rise of the Irish Mob in America, from urban immigrant poverty to political power and wealth.

title: The Liar
description: At the CARE detective agency, investigators see a lot of action but must always keep their cases secret, even when it affects their personal lives.

title: The Lizzie Borden Chronicles
description: Exonerated in the murder of her father and stepmother, Lizzie Borden takes on crime lords, detectives and other foes as she savors her new infamy.

title: The Murder Detectives
description: This series tracks the ups and downs of an 18-month investigation into the 2014 stabbing murder of teenager Nicholas Robinson in Bristol, England.

title: The Sniffer
description: An extraordinary sense of smell gives a crime investigator unique insight into solving mysteries, but his gift takes a toll on his personal life.

title: The Traffickers
description: In this hard-hitting series, journalist Nelufar Hedayat travels the globe to expose an array of black markets, from guns and gold to human body parts.

title: The Twilight Zone (Original Series)
description: Hosted by creator Rod Serling, this groundbreaking anthology series presents tales of the supernatural that are often tinged with social commentary.

title: ThirTEEN Terrors
description: A group of teens searches for the dark truth behind their school's mysterious and brutal history.

title: Tientsin Mystic
description: In an otherworldly river town, a policeman follows the trail of a sinister force to save his community from deadly spells.

title: Timeline
description: Firsthand accounts, re-enactments and computer-generated graphics retell in detail Thailand's biggest news stories from the past.

title: Twin Peaks
description: "Who killed Laura Palmer?" is the question on everyone's lips in a secretive small town, but as an eccentric FBI agent learns, the answer isn't easy.

title: Women Behind Bars
description: This reality series recounts true stories of women who have been convicted for murder, including an in-depth examination of each crime.
